item.title: Introduction to Go Recordkeeper
item.description: I like to play the board game go. Personally, I find that go is more conversational than adversarial. You and your opponent will both have ideas and opinions, you’ll ask each other questions, find surprising answers, be refuted or vindicated. Of course, at the end of the game someone wins, but that’s just the topic; for me, the joy is in the discussion. After finishing a game, it’s sometimes nice to go over the highlights with your opponent, or use an AI to get the “objectively” right answers.
